description: Try our easy to follow Italian-Style Roast Turkey With Roasted Olive Caprese Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian-Style Roast Turkey With Roasted Olive Caprese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: The day before cooking, to brine the turkey, combine salt, sugar, lemon zest and oregano in a bowl. Rub over turkey and inside cavity. Place turkey, breast-side down on a tray wrap with plastic wrap and chill overnight.

The next day, preheat oven to 200°C and line a roasting tray with baking paper. Add potatoes and Mediterranean olives and mix to combine. Place a wire rack over the top then the turkey breast-side up.

For the stuffing, process bread and pine nuts until fine crumbs form. Add Sicilian olives, sundried tomatoes, basil, half the oregano and 1/3 cup of the melted butter. Process until finely chopped and mixture comes together slightly. Fill turkey cavity with stuffing, finishing with lemon halves. Tie legs together with kitchen string and tuck wings under breast. Pour remaining butter over the turkey breast. Stand for 1 hour to come to room temperature.

Place turkey on the middle shelf of the oven and roast for 30 minutes or until turkey is slightly golden. Reduce oven to 150°C. And roast for 2 hours or until juices run clear or a meat thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the thigh reaches 75°C. Remove turkey from the oven, cover loosely with foil and rest for 20 minutes.
For the Caprese salad, toss truss tomatoes, basil and the olives from the roasting pan in a bowl. Add cheese and lemon juice and toss to combine.
Transfer turkey to a platter, cover with remaining oregano and surround with potatoes. Serve with Caprese salad and carve at the table.
